problem.markdown: What purpose does Foot Marches serve for the Warrior Athlete? ( ) To develop explosive leg strength, anaerobic power, and speed. (x) To move successfully under load. ( ) To sustain performance of physically demanding tasks at a higher intensity for a longer duration.
problem.p: What purpose does Foot Marches serve for the Warrior Athlete?

choicegroup.choice: To develop explosive leg strength, anaerobic power, and speed.
To sustain performance of physically demanding tasks at a higher intensity for a longer duration.
